attributes.action: Discourage members of parliament from awarding themselves preferential access to sevices within the house of commons.........
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
......these services include lifts, shops, resturants, photocopiers etc etc.

This is not Victorian England and we feel that the right honourable members should not be behaving in such an elitist manner.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
